author: Dr. Susan Berry
title: Planned Parenthood ‘Provided Medication Abortion…to Mother at Home with Children Running Around’
description: A Planned Parenthood official in New York State said the organization’s new telehealth service is so much in demand that one mother began her drug-induced abortion “at home with her children running around behind her.”
content:
A Planned Parenthood official in New York State said the organizations new telehealth service is so much in demand that one mother began her drug-induced abortion at home with her children running around behind her.
